name: Playtime - Five Nights
description:
Huggy is a monster that escaped from a toy store and is chasing you. Use strategic skills to escape from him.

Huggy terrorizes the villagers...
Only such a smart strategist like you can help the residents to resist the Huggy!

To resist the Huggy, you need to listen to where he makes a sound and be ready for defense.
Hold out for five nights and the villagers will be saved!

Five nights separate you from the victory over the Huggy Monster!

Engoy this Play Time!
